hero.title: Building a Better {dunName}, Together
hero.description: The official platform for residents to report local issues and drive community-led solutions. Your voice matters, and together we can make a difference.

howItWorks.title: Simple Steps to Make a Difference
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting started is easy. Follow these three simple steps to contribute to your community.

step1.title: Spot & Report
step1.description: Easily submit a detailed report about any issue you encounter in the community. Add photos, location, and description to help authorities understand the problem.

step2.title: Community & Authority Review
step2.description: Your report is reviewed by community moderators and relevant local authorities. They assess the issue and determine the best course of action.

step3.title: Track Progress & Resolution
step3.description: Follow the status of your report from submission to final resolution. Get real-time updates and see how your report contributes to making {dunName} better.

statistics.title: Community Impact
statistics.subtitle: See how our community is making a difference together

announcements.title: Community Announcements
announcements.subtitle: Stay informed about important updates and events in your community

features.title: Your Voice, Our Community
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to make community engagement simple and effective

transparentTracking.title: Transparent Tracking
transparentTracking.description: Monitor the progress of every report from submission to resolution in real-time. Stay informed about what's happening in your community.

directCommunication.title: Direct Communication
directCommunication.description: Engage with local authorities and neighbors to work together on solutions. Build stronger connections within your community.

collectiveProblemSolving.title: Collective Problem-Solving
collectiveProblemSolving.description: Be part of a community that actively contributes to making {dunName} better. Together, we can achieve more than we ever could alone.

cta.title: Ready to Make an Impact?
cta.description: Join your neighbors in building a stronger community. Report an issue or register to stay informed about what's happening in {dunName}.

footer.description: The official platform for residents to report local issues and drive community-led solutions in {dunName}.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: {dunName} Community Platform

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: Empowering communities to take action. Connecting residents with local authorities to build a better {dunName} together.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe in empowering communities to take action. Our platform connects residents with local authorities, making it easy to report issues, track progress, and work together to build a better {dunName}.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.issueReporting: Issue Reporting: Simple, accessible way to report community issues
whatWeDo.transparency: Transparency: Real-time tracking of issue status and resolution
whatWeDo.communityEngagement: Community Engagement: Connect neighbors and local authorities
whatWeDo.accountability: Accountability: Ensure issues are addressed and resolved

values.title: Our Values
values.transparency: Transparency: We believe in open communication and clear processes.
values.communityFirst: Community First: Every feature is designed with the community's needs in mind.
values.actionOriented: Action-Oriented: We focus on results and real-world impact.
values.collaboration: Collaboration: We bring together residents, authorities, and stakeholders.

about.joinUs: Join us in building a stronger, more connected {dunName} community.

contact.title: Contact Us

careline.title: CARELINE

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about reporting issues and managing your account.

reportIssue.question: How do I report a new issue like a pothole or broken streetlight?
reportIssue.answer: To report a new issue, click on the 'Report a New Issue' in the sidebar. Fill out the form with details about the issue, including its location, a description, and a photo if possible. Once submitted, you'll receive a confirmation and a tracking number.

trackStatus.question: How can I track the status of my reported issue?
trackStatus.answer: You can track the status of any issue you've reported by navigating to the 'Dashboard' from the sidebar. There you will find a list of all your submissions and their current status, such as 'Pending', 'In Progress', or 'Resolved'.

resetPassword.question: How do I reset my password?
resetPassword.answer: If you've forgotten your password, go to the Login page and select the 'Forgot Password?' link. Enter your registered email address, and we will send you a link to reset your password.

platformPurpose.question: What is the purpose of this platform?
platformPurpose.answer: This platform enables residents of {dunName} to report local community issues, track their resolution, and stay informed about community developments. Our goal is to foster a responsive and collaborative environment.

cantFindAnswer.title: Can't find an answer?
cantFindAnswer.description: Our team is here to help. Reach out to us for any questions you can't find answers to.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Committed to protecting your privacy and personal data security in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act 2010 (PDPA).
privacyPolicy.content:
# Privacy Policy

## {dunName} Community Platform

This Privacy Policy describes how the {dunName} Community Platform ("we", "us", "platform") collects, uses, stores, and protects your personal information. We are committed to protecting your privacy and complying with Malaysia's Personal Data Protection Act 2010 (PDPA).

**Effective Date:** {effectiveDate}

---

## 1. Information We Collect

### 1.1 Personal Information
When you register and use this platform, we may collect the following information:

- **Identity Information:** Full name, identity card number (IC), email address, phone number
- **Location Information:** Residential address, zone, village, GPS coordinates (if you grant permission)
- **Account Information:** Username, password (stored in encrypted form), membership status
- **Household Information:** Family member information related to assistance programs and community services
- **Report Information:** Details of reported issues, photos, videos, and submitted documents
- **Interaction Information:** Communication history with staff, feedback, and platform activity

### 1.2 Technical Information
We automatically collect some technical information when you browse the platform:

- IP address
- Browser type and version
- Operating system
- Access time and date
- Pages visited
- Referral URL

### 1.3 Cookies and Similar Technologies
This platform uses cookies to enhance user experience. Cookies are small text files stored on your device. You can control cookie usage through your browser settings.

---

## 2. Purpose of Data Collection and Usage

We use your personal information for the following purposes:

### 2.1 Service Provision
- Process and manage community issue reports
- Provide access to assistance programs and services
- Facilitate communication between residents and local authorities
- Manage memberships and user preferences

### 2.2 Service Improvement
- Analyze platform usage for improvements
- Provide statistics and reports to authorities
- Conduct research and data analysis (in aggregate and non-identifiable form)

### 2.3 Communication
- Send notifications about your report status
- Send important announcements to the community
- Respond to inquiries and provide support

### 2.4 Legal Compliance
- Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
- Provide information to authorities when required by law
- Protect the rights and safety of users and others

---

## 3. Information Disclosure

### 3.1 Sharing with Third Parties
We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties. However, we may share information in the following situations:

- **Local Authorities:** Issue report information is shared with relevant government agencies for issue resolution purposes
- **Service Providers:** We may share data with technology service providers who help operate the platform (with confidentiality agreements)
- **Legal Requirements:** When required by law, courts, or competent authorities

### 3.2 Sharing with Community
Some information may be displayed publicly on the platform:

- Username (not real name) on public reports
- Status and progress of issue reports (without sensitive personal information)
- Community statistics in aggregate form

---

## 4. Data Security

### 4.1 Security Measures
We take reasonable security measures to protect your personal information:

- **Encryption:** Sensitive data is stored in encrypted form
- **Access Control:** Only authorized staff have access to personal information
- **Audit Log:** All data access is recorded for audit purposes
- **Technical Support:** Security systems are constantly updated and monitored

### 4.2 Data Storage
Your data is stored on secure servers in Malaysia. We ensure that our service providers comply with high security standards.

---

## 5. Data Retention Period

We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to:

- Provide the requested services
- Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
- Resolve disputes or enforce agreements

After a reasonable period or when data is no longer needed, we will delete or anonymize the data according to secure procedures.

---

## 6. Your Rights Under PDPA

Under the Personal Data Protection Act 2010, you have the following rights:

### 6.1 Right of Access
You have the right to request access to personal information we store about you.

### 6.2 Right of Correction
You have the right to request correction of inaccurate, incomplete, or misleading personal information.

### 6.3 Right to Withdraw Consent
You have the right to withdraw your consent for processing personal data at any time.

### 6.4 Right to Limit Processing
You have the right to request us to limit the processing of your personal data under certain circumstances.

### 6.5 Right to Data Deletion
You have the right to request deletion of your personal data, subject to legal requirements to retain certain records.

### 6.6 How to Exercise Your Rights
To exercise any of the above rights, please contact us via:

- **Email:** [email address]
- **Phone:** [phone number]
- **Through Platform:** Log in and access your profile section

We will process your request within a reasonable period (usually within 21 working days).

---

## 7. Children's Data

This platform is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you know that a child has provided personal information to us, please contact us immediately.

---

## 8. Links to Third-Party Websites

This platform may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy policies or content of those websites. We encourage you to read the privacy policy of each website you visit.

---

## 9. Amendments to Privacy Policy

We reserve the right to change or amend this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be notified through:

- Notifications in the platform
- Email to registered users (if significant changes)
- Update of the "Effective Date" at the top of this document

We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy regularly. Continued use of the platform after any changes means you accept the updated Privacy Policy.

---

## 10. Consent

By using this platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any part of this policy, please do not use this platform.

---

## 11. Contact Us

If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us:

**{dunName} Community Platform**

- **Address:** [Office Address]
- **Email:** [Email Address]
- **Phone:** [Phone Number]
- **Office Hours:** Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

---

## 12. Language

This document is provided in Bahasa Malaysia. If there is any conflict between the Bahasa Malaysia version and other language versions, the Bahasa Malaysia version shall prevail.

---

**Thank you for trusting the {dunName} Community Platform with your personal information. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your data.**

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.subtitle: Terms and conditions for using the {dunName} Community Platform. Please read carefully before using the platform.
termsOfService.content:
# Terms of Service

## {dunName} Community Platform

These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of the {dunName} Community Platform ("Platform", "we", "us"). Please read carefully before using this Platform.

**Effective Date:** {effectiveDate}

By accessing or using this Platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please do not use this Platform.

---

## 1. Acceptance of Terms

### 1.1 Agreement
By registering, accessing, or using this Platform, you acknowledge that you:

- Are at least 18 years old, OR
- Are 13-17 years old and have obtained consent from a parent or legal guardian

### 1.2 Legal Capacity
You confirm that you have the legal capacity to enter into this agreement and comply with all Terms and Conditions.

### 1.3 True Representation
You confirm that all information you provide during registration is true, accurate, and current.

---

## 2. Description of Services

### 2.1 Services Provided
The {dunName} Community Platform provides the following services:

- **Community Issue Reporting:** Enables residents to report issues and problems in the community
- **Status Tracking:** Monitor the progress of resolving reported issues
- **Communication:** Facilitate communication between residents and local authorities
- **Assistance Programs:** Access to information and applications for community assistance programs
- **Announcements:** Important information and announcements to the community
- **Community Statistics:** Data and statistics on community activities

### 2.2 Changes to Services
We reserve the right to change, suspend, or discontinue any part of the Platform at any time without prior notice.

---

## 3. Registration and User Account

### 3.1 Registration Requirements
To use some Platform services, you need to register and create an account. During registration, you are required to:

- Provide true, accurate, and complete information
- Maintain and update your information
- Choose a strong and secure password
- Keep your account information confidential

### 3.2 Account Responsibility
You are fully responsible for:

- All activities that occur under your account
- Maintaining the security of your password and account information
- Immediately notifying us of any unauthorized use
- Ensuring that you log out of your account after each session

### 3.3 Account Suspension and Termination
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account immediately, without prior notice, if:

- You violate any of these Terms
- You engage in illegal or fraudulent activities
- You provide false or misleading information
- We believe your actions may cause harm to the Platform or other users

---

## 4. Permitted Platform Use

### 4.1 Permitted Use
You are permitted to use the Platform to:

- Report legitimate and valid community issues
- Communicate with staff and authorities in a polite and professional manner
- Access information and services provided for the community
- Contribute to community welfare

### 4.2 Prohibited Use
You are NOT permitted to:

- **Illegal Activities:** Use the Platform for any illegal purpose
- **Inappropriate Content:** Send, upload, or share content that:
  - Contains threats, harassment, or bullying
  - Is discriminatory, inflammatory, or hateful
  - Is pornographic or obscene
  - Is fraudulent, false, or misleading
  - Violates others' intellectual property rights
  - Contains viruses, malware, or harmful code

- **Fraudulent Activities:**
  - Make false or fraudulent reports
  - Impersonate others
  - Access other users' accounts without authorization
  - Manipulate data or systems

- **Commercial Activities:** Use the Platform for commercial purposes without written permission
- **Spam:** Send unsolicited messages or content in bulk
- **Disruption:** Disrupt or interfere with Platform operations or other users

---

## 5. User Content

### 5.1 Content Ownership
You retain ownership of all content you submit, upload, or post on the Platform ("User Content"). However, by contributing User Content, you grant us a license to:

- Use, display, and distribute User Content on the Platform
- Modify User Content (if necessary) for technical purposes
- Share User Content with relevant authorities for issue resolution purposes

### 5.2 Content Warranty
You warrant that:

- You have the right to contribute User Content
- User Content does not violate third-party rights
- User Content is true and accurate (especially for issue reports)

### 5.3 Content Removal
We reserve the right to remove or reject any User Content that violates these Terms without prior notice.

---

## 6. Intellectual Property Rights

### 6.1 Platform Ownership
All content, features, and functions of the Platform (except User Content) are owned by the {dunName} Community Platform or its licensors and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

### 6.2 Limited License
We grant you a limited, non-transferable, and non-exclusive license to access and use the Platform for personal and non-commercial purposes, subject to these Terms.

### 6.3 Restrictions
You are NOT permitted to:

- Copy, modify, or create derivative works from the Platform
- Use Platform content for commercial purposes without permission
- Remove or alter any intellectual property notices

---

## 7. Disclaimer of Warranties

### 7.1 "As Is"
The Platform is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without any warranties, express or implied. We do not warrant that:

- The Platform will always be available, uninterrupted, or error-free
- Information provided is accurate, complete, or current
- The Platform will meet your needs or expectations
- Any defects or errors will be corrected

### 7.2 Use at Your Own Risk
Use of the Platform is at your own risk. You are responsible for taking reasonable precautions.

---

## 8. Limitation of Liability

### 8.1 Exclusion of Liability
To the maximum extent permitted by law, the {dunName} Community Platform, its staff, and agents will NOT be liable for:

- Any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from use or inability to use the Platform
- Loss of data, profits, or business opportunities
- Service interruptions or failures
- Actions or content of other users

### 8.2 Limitation of Liability
If, despite the above disclaimer, we are found liable, our liability is limited to the amount you paid us (if any) for using the related services in the 12 months before the claim.

---

## 9. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the {dunName} Community Platform, its staff, and agents from any claims, losses, liabilities, damages, costs, and expenses (including reasonable attorney fees) arising from:

- Your use or misuse of the Platform
- Your violation of these Terms
- Your violation of third-party rights
- User Content you submit

---

## 10. Termination

### 10.1 Termination by You
You may terminate your account at any time by contacting us or using the termination function in the Platform.

### 10.2 Termination by Us
We may terminate or suspend your access to the Platform immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including but not limited to violation of these Terms.

### 10.3 Effect of Termination
After termination:

- Your access to the Platform will be terminated
- We may delete or retain your data according to our privacy policy
- Provisions that should continue to be effective will remain in effect

---

## 11. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to change or amend these Terms at any time. Significant changes will be notified through:

- Notifications in the Platform
- Email to registered users
- Update of the "Effective Date" at the top of this document

Continued use of the Platform after any changes means you accept the updated Terms. If you do not agree with the changes, you must stop using the Platform.

---

## 12. Governing Law

### 12.1 Malaysian Law
These Terms are governed and interpreted according to Malaysian law, regardless of conflict of law principles.

### 12.2 Jurisdiction
Any disputes arising from or related to these Terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of Malaysian courts.

---

## 13. General Provisions

### 13.1 Entire Agreement
These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding the use of the Platform.

### 13.2 Severability
If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, that provision will be severed and the remainder will continue in full force and effect.

### 13.3 No Waiver
Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of that right.

### 13.4 Notices
All notices under these Terms must be made in writing and sent to the address specified in the "Contact Us" section.

---

## 14. Contact Us

If you have any questions regarding these Terms, please contact us:

**{dunName} Community Platform**

- **Address:** [Office Address]
- **Email:** [Email Address]
- **Phone:** [Phone Number]
- **Office Hours:** Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

---

## 15. Language

This document is provided in Bahasa Malaysia. If there is any conflict between the Bahasa Malaysia version and other language versions, the Bahasa Malaysia version shall prevail.

---

**By using the {dunName} Community Platform, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these Terms and Conditions and agree to be bound by them.**

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Consent
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our platform. Cookies help us maintain your session, remember your preferences, and ensure the platform functions correctly. By continuing to use our platform, you consent to our use of cookies in accordance with our Privacy Policy and Malaysia's Personal Data Protection Act 2010 (PDPA).
cookieConsent.essentialCookies: Essential cookies are required for authentication and session management. These cookies cannot be disabled as they are necessary for the platform to function properly.
cookieConsent.privacyLink: Learn more in our Privacy Policy
